text: Houghton Lake is an unincorporated community in Roscommon Township, Roscommon County in the U.S. state of Michigan.Houghton Lake Area Tourism & Convention BureauHoughton Lake Happenings BlogHoughton Lake Events Calendar The Census Bureau called the settlement a census-designated place (CDP). The population was 5,294 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Michigan Category:Census-designated places in Michigan
title: Houghton Lake, Michigan
